desc: This website provide an 8-page fact site for all planets in our solar system. This website built with library react-router-dom, headless-ui, and hero-icons.

A final assignment from course 'Learn to Build Webs App with React' which provide by Dicoding and IDCamp 2022 : Indosat Oredoo. This project is static website, so the data won't change after you refresh the page. In this project you can make a new personal note, grouping notes based on archive or unarchive, and searching all your personal notes.
A simple website that provide information about github's used based on their username. This project was built using Github API

This project is one of the most challange which given by Frontendmentor.io. Advice Generator is a simple website and fetch data from https://api.adviceslip.com/. When you clicked the dice icon, it will show a random advice.
A final assignment from course Backend Developer which provide by HIMSI UIN Jakarta. Each team have two member and Our team got the best team achievment
